entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 12:47 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: SE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
